title: 7.5.1 Create compliance database schema
body:
## Parent Issue
#33 - 7.5 Compliance Framework Mapping

## Objective
Create database schema for compliance frameworks, controls, and mappings.

## Tables
- compliance_frameworks
- compliance_domains
- compliance_controls
- rule_compliance_mappings

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/models/compliance_framework.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/models/compliance_control.py`
- `alembic/versions/xxx_create_compliance_tables.py`

## Estimated Time: 2 hours
